d Day of month in single digit: 6

dy Day of year: 361
Era A.D.
m Month in single digit: 8

min Minutes: 32
mm Month in double digits: 08
MM Month in full: August
sp Split seconds: 999
ss Seconds: 59
w Week of year single digit: 9
ww Week of year double digit: 52
yy Year in 2 digits: 78
yyyy Year in 4 digits: 2013
